name: The Copenhagen Runner
description:
Made for QuantumJam 2017.

Welcome to The Copenhagen Interpretation Runner.  

You are a rogue electron attempting to escape the Stanford Linear Collider.  

Utilizing your ability to be both a wave and a particle, avoid the traps and keep ahead of the accelerator!

Controls:
A and D or LeftArrow and RightArrow to move
Space to jump
Hold LeftCtrl to turn into a wave
Escape quits (from death screen)

Hints:
The wave can pass through obstacles and traps, but moves slower so use it sparingly.

Wave collapse is unpredictable, so be careful!
